title: Better Call Saul Season 6 Episodes 1 & 2 Review
description:
Go to http://creditkarma.com to find the card for you.

Barrett, Andy, and Roger are joined by the one and only Jake Baldino to share their thoughts so far on Better Call Saul Season 6 AND give their theories for the final season.
